title: Enterprise Asset roles and permissions
content:
There are specific roles associated with Enterprise Asset. Service Management uses role-based permissions to enable you to complete a task that's appropriate to your role. The tenant administrator manages and assigns these permissions.

For new tenants, these permissions are automatically included in the default roles. However, for existing tenants, you must manually add these permissions to all OOB Roles listed in the table.

The following OOB roles are provided with Enterprise Asset.

Role Responsibilities
Asset & Configuration Administrator Create, view, update, delete, and manage enterprise assets
Asset & Configuration Manager Create, view, and update enterprise assets
Change Approver View enterprise assets

Review the individual permission assignments for each role in Administration > Master Data > People > Roles.
